text: <speak>We will deliver the card to your registered address. Can you please confirm your delivery address zip code is <say-as interpret-as="verbatim" google:style="zero-as-zero">$flow.zip_code</say-as>?</speak>
Okay, you can update your address by logging in to your Net Banking profile.
Alternatively, we can also share a link with your registered phone number via SMS to update your address. To confirm, please say yes or no.
